patch 8.2.2009: MS-Windows: setting $LANG in gvimext only causes problems

Problem:    MS-Windows: setting $LANG in gvimext only causes problems.
Solution:   Do not set $LANG. (Ken Takata, closes #7325)

attachments.text: …lems Problem: MS-Windows: setting $LANG in gvimext only causes problems. Solution: Do not set $LANG. (Ken Takata, closes #7325)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/032f40afb88b24043f96655aa248267a4f54faa8|patch 8.2.2008: MS-Windows GUI: handling channel messages lags>
patch 8.2.2008: MS-Windows GUI: handling channel messages lags

Problem:    MS-Windows GUI: handling channel messages lags.
Solution:   Reduce the wait time from 100 to 10 msec. (closes #7097)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2008: MS-Windows GUI: handling channel messages lags · vim/vim@032f40a
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2008: MS-Windows GUI: handling channel messages lags · vim/vim@032f40a
attachments.text: Problem: MS-Windows GUI: handling channel messages lags. Solution: Reduce the wait time from 100 to 10 msec. (closes #7097)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/17ab28daa060c3c263841329e74befb9c6e8b588|patch 8.2.2007: test for insert mode in popup is not reliable>
patch 8.2.2007: test for insert mode in popup is not reliable

Problem:    Test for insert mode in popup is not reliable.
Solution:   Wait for the popup to disappear. (Ozaki Kiichi, closes #7321)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2007: test for insert mode in popup is not reliable · vim/vim@17ab28d

attachments.text: Problem: Test for insert mode in popup is not reliable. Solution: Wait for the popup to disappear. (Ozaki Kiichi, closes #7321)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/88774a30c0b1957a6177cdb69d2becedae610299|patch 8.2.2006: .pbtxt files are not recognized>
patch 8.2.2006: .pbtxt files are not recognized

Problem:    .pbtxt files are not recognized.
Solution:   Recognize .pbtxt as protobuf text buffers. (closes #7326)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2006: .pbtxt files are not recognized · vim/vim@88774a3
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2006: .pbtxt files are not recognized · vim/vim@88774a3
attachments.text: Problem: .pbtxt files are not recognized. Solution: Recognize .pbtxt as protobuf text buffers. (closes #7326)

text:

patch 8.2.2005: redoing a mapping with  doesn't work properly

Problem:    Redoing a mapping with  doesn't work properly.
Solution:   Fill the redo buffer.  Use "" instead of a key code.
            (closes #7282)

patch 8.2.2004: compiler warning for uninitialized variable

Problem:    Compiler warning for uninitialized variable.
Solution:   Initialize "ufunc". (John Marriott)

attachments.title: patch 8.2.2004: compiler warning for uninitialized variable · vim/vim@b3a0194
attachments.text: Problem: Compiler warning for uninitialized variable. Solution: Initialize "ufunc". (John Marriott)

patch 8.2.2002: Vim9: lambda argument shadowed by function name

Problem:    Vim9: lambda argument shadowed by function name.
Solution:   Let function name be shadowed by lambda argument. (closes #7313)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2002: Vim9: lambda argument shadowed by function name · vim/vim@52bf81c
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2002: Vim9: lambda argument shadowed by function name · vim/vim@52bf81c
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: lambda argument shadowed by function name. Solution: Let function name be shadowed by lambda argument. (closes #7313)

patch 8.2.2001: Vim9: :def function does not apply 'maxfuncdepth'

Problem:    Vim9: :def function does not apply 'maxfuncdepth'.
Solution:   Use 'maxfuncdepth'. (issue #7313)
